The tweet in question was posted by righ: wing commentator Bill Mitchell on March 21, 2020, where he stated, "When COVID-19 reaches 51 million infected in the US and kills 55,000, someone let me know."
The expert mentions that the U: S. has surpassed 55,000 fatalities from COVID-19, providing data from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) as evidence.
Social media users responded to Mitchell: s tweet, reminding him of his statement, indicating that the claim received attention and generated discussions online.
